It does seem strange at first, but after using it for a couple iterations
you start to wonder how anyone could do it any other way.. ;0)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ray Tayek [mailto:rtayek@...]
> Sent: 22 February 2002 14:23
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [junit] Re: JavaDocs
> 
> 
> At 11:48 AM 2/22/02 +0000, you wrote:
> >No, just that the initial directory is different , the 
> package structure
> >remains the same:
> >eg.
> >
> >project_root
> >           |  -- src -- com -- myapp
> >             |
> >             |  -- test-- com -- myapp
> 
> ok (i think) - seems very strange to have stuff in different 
> directories 
> that are in the *same* package. ...
> it does work though
> thanks
>
